text: A huge part of acting in movies is appetite. You do your best work when you've got a lot of appetite and you really want to embrace something. When you get tired, you don't have that hunger.
author: Clive Owen

text: Obviously, I'm attracted to heavier movies.
author: Clive Owen

text: I want to be in movies that stand the test of time.
author: Clive Owen

text: Ultimately, to have a career in movies, to a certain extent, certainly in England, you can't sustain a career in just English movies.
